Mike Pence , R-Ind., is set to announce a decision on his political future on Friday, according to his mother, who has been urging him to finally put an end to all of the building speculation over his political future. `` He will be making his announcement tomorrow,'' said Nancy Mike Pence Fritsch, contacted today by telephone at her home in Columbus, Ind.
